text: He paigambara! Imanadharakanna jihada (dharmayud'dha) sathi protsahita kara. Jara tumacyapaiki visa dhairyasalihi asatila tara te donase jananvara varcasvasali rahatila ani jara tumacyapaiki sambhara asatila tara eka hajara imana na rakhanaryanvara varcasvasali rahatila. Ya karanane ki te nasamaja loka aheta
